:: Wolfgang ::

:: Wolfgang sees and hears some of his equipment go off.  The 
equipment notifies Wolfgang of a strange occurance happening in 
China.  Wolfgang walks into a hallway and opens an open com-message 
to the whole alliance base and all its inhabitants.  ::

" All alliance members, this is your co-commander speaking.  I need 
volunteers to come with me to investigate an event taking place in 
China.  Meet me near the exit of the Iron Fist."

:: Flies towards the Exit ::
